faq.howToCreateAccount: How do I create an account?
faq.createAccountAnswer: To create an account, download the Propella app and tap 'Sign Up'. You'll need to provide your email address, phone number, and create a password. You can also sign up using your Google or Apple account for convenience.
faq.howToListProperty: How do I list my property for rent or sale?
faq.listPropertyAnswer: To list your property, tap the '+' button in the app and select 'Add Property'. Fill in all the required information including photos, price, location, and property details. Your listing will be reviewed and approved within 24-48 hours.
faq.whatAreFees: What are the fees for using Propella?
faq.feesAnswer: Propella charges a small platform fee for successful transactions. For property reservations, there's a reservation fee that varies based on the property value. All fees are clearly displayed before you make any payments.
faq.howToContactOwner: How do I contact a property owner or agent?
faq.contactOwnerAnswer: You can contact property owners or agents directly through the app's messaging feature. Simply tap on a property listing and use the 'Contact' button to start a conversation. You can also call them directly using the phone number provided.
faq.infoSafeAnswer: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your contact details without your permission, and you can control what information is visible to other users.
faq.howToVerifyAgent: How do I verify my identity as an agent?
faq.verifyAgentAnswer: To verify your identity as an agent, go to your profile settings and select 'Agent Verification'. You'll need to upload your license or certification documents. Our team will review and verify your credentials within 2-3 business days.
faq.canScheduleViewings: Can I schedule property viewings through the app?
faq.scheduleViewingsAnswer: Yes, you can schedule property viewings through the app. When you contact a property owner or agent, you can request a viewing and they can confirm the appointment. You'll receive notifications about your scheduled viewings.
faq.paymentMethodsAnswer: Propella accepts various payment methods including mobile money (MTN, Orange Money), bank transfers, and card payments through our secure payment partners. All transactions are processed securely.
faq.howToReportListing: How do I report a fake or misleading listing?
faq.reportListingAnswer: If you encounter a fake or misleading listing, tap the 'Report' button on the property page. Select the reason for reporting and provide any additional details. Our team will investigate and take appropriate action.
faq.canSaveProperties: Can I save properties to view later?
faq.savePropertiesAnswer: Yes, you can save properties to your favorites by tapping the heart icon on any property listing. You can access all your saved properties in the 'Favorites' section of your profile.
faq.howToUpdateListing: How do I update my property listing?
faq.updateListingAnswer: To update your property listing, go to your profile and select 'My Properties'. Find the property you want to edit and tap the edit icon. Make your changes and save. Updates will be reviewed before going live.
faq.whatIfCancelReservation: What happens if I need to cancel a reservation?
faq.cancelReservationAnswer: Cancellation policies vary by property owner. Generally, you can cancel a reservation within 24 hours of booking for a full refund. After that, refund policies depend on the specific property's terms. Check the property details for cancellation information.
faq.howToChangeSettings: How do I change my account settings?
faq.changeSettingsAnswer: To change your account settings, go to your profile and tap the settings icon. You can update your personal information, change your password, manage notifications, and adjust privacy settings.
faq.isAvailableInArea: Is Propella available in my area?
faq.availableInAreaAnswer: Propella is currently available in major cities across Cameroon. We're continuously expanding to new areas. If you don't see properties in your area, please contact us and we'll let you know when we launch in your location.
faq.howToGetHelp: How do I get help if I have a problem?
faq.getHelpAnswer: If you need help, you can contact our support team through the 'Help & Support' section in your profile. You can email us at Propellacm@gmail.com or call us at +237 672 239 591. We typically respond within 24 hours.
faq.findAnswersToCommonQuestions: Find answers to the most common questions about using Propella. If you can't find what you're looking for, please contact our support team.
faq.supportTeamHereToHelp: If you couldn't find the answer to your question, our support team is here to help.

help.getHelpFromSupport: Get help from our support team
help.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Propella mobile application ("App"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
help.serviceDescription: Propella is a real estate platform that connects property owners, agents, and potential tenants/buyers. The App provides:
help.propertyListings: â€¢ Property listings for rent and sale
help.paymentProcessing: â€¢ Payment processing for reservations and transactions
help.propertyVerification: â€¢ Property verification and review services
help.accountAgreement: To access certain features of the App, you must create an account. You agree to:
help.provideAccurateInfo: â€¢ Provide accurate and complete information
help.maintainSecurity: â€¢ Maintain the security of your account credentials
help.notifyUnauthorized: â€¢ Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
help.acceptResponsibility: â€¢ Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
help.provideAccurateProperty: â€¢ Must provide accurate property information
help.responsibleForAvailability: â€¢ Are responsible for property availability and condition
help.complyWithLaws: â€¢ Must comply with local rental/sale laws
help.liableForMisrepresentations: â€¢ Are liable for any misrepresentations
help.properlyLicensed: â€¢ Must be properly licensed and verified
help.actInBestInterest: â€¢ Must act in the best interest of their clients
help.provideAccuratePersonalInfo: â€¢ Must provide accurate personal information
help.responsibleForPayment: â€¢ Are responsible for payment obligations
help.respectViewings: â€¢ Must respect property viewings and appointments
help.usersWhoPostAgree: Users who post property listings agree to:
help.provideAccurateUpToDate: â€¢ Provide accurate and up-to-date information
help.discloseKnownIssues: â€¢ Disclose any known issues or limitations
help.notPostFraudulent: â€¢ Not post fraudulent or misleading listings

privacy.introductionText: Propella ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and related services.
privacy.nameEmailPhone: â€¢ Name, email address, and phone number
privacy.paymentInformation: â€¢ Payment information (processed securely by third parties)
privacy.identityVerification: â€¢ Identity verification documents (for agents and landlords)
privacy.propertyDetails: â€¢ Property details, photos, and descriptions
privacy.usagePatterns: â€¢ App usage patterns and preferences
privacy.searchHistory: â€¢ Search history and saved properties
privacy.deviceInformation: â€¢ Device information and app performance data
privacy.viewingHistory: â€¢ Property viewing history by location
privacy.howWeUseText: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.providePlatform: â€¢ Provide and maintain our real estate platform
privacy.connectUsers: â€¢ Connect property owners with potential tenants/buyers
privacy.verifyIdentities: â€¢ Verify user identities and property information
privacy.sendNotifications: â€¢ Send notifications and updates about properties
privacy.improveServices: â€¢ Improve our services and user experience
privacy.customerSupport: â€¢ Provide customer support and resolve issues
privacy.legalObligations: â€¢ Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud
privacy.sharingText: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.listingsVisible: â€¢ Property listings are visible to all users
privacy.contactShared: â€¢ Contact information may be shared when you initiate communication
privacy.profileVisible: â€¢ Profile information is visible to other users
privacy.paymentProcessors: â€¢ Payment processors for transaction processing
privacy.cloudStorage: â€¢ Cloud storage providers for data hosting
privacy.analyticsServices: â€¢ Analytics services for app improvement
privacy.supportTools: â€¢ Customer support tools for assistance
privacy.requiredByLaw: â€¢ When required by law or court order
privacy.protectRights: â€¢ To protect our rights and safety
privacy.preventFraud: â€¢ To prevent fraud or illegal activities
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
privacy.encryption: â€¢ Encryption of data in transit and at rest
privacy.secureAuthentication: â€¢ Secure authentication and access controls
privacy.securityAudits: â€¢ Regular security audits and updates
privacy.limitedAccess: â€¢ Limited access to personal information
privacy.securePayment: â€¢ Secure payment processing through trusted providers
privacy.retentionText: We retain your information for as long as necessary to:
privacy.provideServices: â€¢ Provide our services to you
privacy.resolveDisputes: â€¢ Resolve disputes and enforce agreements
privacy.retentionPeriod: We will delete your information when it is no longer needed for these purposes.
privacy.rightsText: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.accessReview: â€¢ Access and review your personal information
privacy.updateCorrect: â€¢ Update or correct inaccurate information
privacy.requestDeletion: â€¢ Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.optOutMarketing: â€¢ Opt out of marketing communications
privacy.exportData: â€¢ Export your data in a portable format
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
privacy.rememberPreferences: â€¢ Remember your preferences and settings
privacy.analyzeUsage: â€¢ Analyze app usage and performance
privacy.personalizedContent: â€¢ Provide personalized content and recommendations
privacy.ensureSecurity: â€¢ Ensure security and prevent fraud
privacy.cookiesNote: You can control cookie settings through your device settings.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Our app integrates with third-party services:
privacy.paymentProcessorsList: â€¢ Payment processors (Fapshi, MTN, Orange Money)
privacy.thirdPartyNote: These services have their own privacy policies.
privacy.childrenText: Our app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.internationalText: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the app and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the app after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
